data.name: Prime of Flames
data.detailed_description:
About Demo

My team is still working on the English version of Demo, I am so sorry about the delay. We will try to finish it ASAP.


About Us

Hello everyone, we are from RAYKA STUDIO which was built by several like-minded gamers. It is really glad to meet you here. Prime of Flames is the first game of our studio, also is the start of Taikoo World Outlook. We hope to present a special strategy game.
Welcome to join us. Let us ignite the ancient fire together, and lead to the gate of the ancient journey that is about to open!


About the Game

INTRODUCTION

Prime of Flames is a special strategy game that combines Wargame and Roguelike. You will lead the warriors of different clans to find the truth of history. Each clan has its own unique talents and abilities. You can recruit a beasts army to help you, or build a huge bronze colossus, or even construct a magic field to defeat the powerful enemies. There are no identical battles here, just more imagination tactics.

WORLD OUTLOOK

The ancestors once built a great and prosperous country in the Wilderness, and each clan lived and multiplied with the help of the ancestors. Until the day disaster came, the meteorite destroyed the world of the ancestors, while the demons, ghosts and orcs ravaged this land, and even the witches who sheltered Human broke their covenant and disappeared. As the guider of the former ancestors, you wake up and come. In the name of Star Envoy, you leave for the Human camp, and lead the warriors of different clans with talents and abilities to find the truth of history and disaster...

FEATURES

  • Well-designed the wargame levels. Hundreds of level maps with unique terrain and powerful enemies. Let us get it over with.
  • Hundreds of characters of different clans with kinds of talents, abilities and skills are waiting for your call and command.
  • Simplified skill operation and various skill designs are precisely integrated into the game experience that allow you to easily get started and have fun!
  • Try to map out your strategy ahead of schedule in Endless mode, Boss challenge and other gameplay.

In the name of Star Envoy, you leave for the Human camp, and lead the warriors of different clans with talents and abilities to find the truth of history and disaster.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-3220
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, Capable of OpenGL 3.0+ Support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3470
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, Capable of OpenGL 3.0+ Support
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
